00224 inline int KviConsoleWindow::selectedCount()
00225 {
00226         return m_pNotifyListView->selectedCount();
00227 }
00228 
00229 inline bool KviConsoleWindow::isIPv6Connection()
00230 {
00231         KVI_ASSERT(connection());
00232         return connection()->target()->server()->isIPv6();
00233 }
00234 
00235 inline bool KviConsoleWindow::isNotConnected()
00236 {
00237         return (context()->state() == KviIrcContext::Idle);
00238 }
00239 
00240 inline QString KviConsoleWindow::currentNetworkName()
00241 {
00242         return (connection() ? connection()->currentNetworkName() : QString());
00243 }
